alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued February 23 at 8:09PM PST until February 24 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. Locally colder temperatures could occur in the far western portions near Calabasas, Agoura Hills, Westlake Village. * WHERE...Santa Monica Mountains, San Fernando Valley and San Gabriel Valley. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area
